page.title: 07Education 2
page.content: Arthur Mellows Village College is situated in Glinton.The main catchment area is the Old Soke of Peterbough,but under the terms of the 1980 Education Act children enter the school from outside the Soke. It was built in the late 1940's and there have been extensions ever since.The age group is from 11 to 18.School starts at 9.00 and lasts till 12.25.Next its lunch break,that finishes at 1.35.The school day ends at 3.45. It is a considerably large school with 69 teachers and 11 thousand pupils.There are many clubs organised there aswell.Also if the pupils home is not within walking distance there is a bus service aswell.The Warden is Mr. Lowings and the coordinator of the lower school is Mr. Bedwell.
